module_MI_tips_title.message: If you are planning to enter more than one ASIN in your search, go to the web app!

module_MI_tips_content.message:
1. Mining keywords by keyword - Find relevant keywords and long-tail words, build your keyword database.
2. Word Frequency - Help sellers to classify keyword attributes, highlight the needs and pain points of customers.
3. PPC Keywords - Find the right keywords for your PPC campaign, help you show your ads to the right customers.
4. Target Long-Tail Keywords - Get effective Keywords, assist in boosting a product's rank organically in Amazon Search Results and in uncovering niche markets

module_RV_table_AC_tips.message: The product you are analyzing shows up as Amazon's Choice for this keyword

module_RV_table_keyword_type_tips.message: The position an ASIN appears on the search results page (SERP) when a shopper searches for the associated keyword.

module_RV_table_conversion_and_traffic_t.message: 该ASIN在对应关键词的搜索结果下曝光的具体位置

module_RV_table_keyword_distribution_tip.message: The percentage of organic traffic and ads traffic generated by the keyword for ASIN

module_table_impressions_tips.message:
Upper: Impressions, The total number of times all ASINs appear in the search results page for a specific keyword within a natural month, such as March 2024.
Lower: Clicks, The total number of times that search results are clicked for a specific keyword within a natural month, such as March 2024.

module_table_impressions_filter_tips.message: The total number of times all ASINs appear in the search results page for a specific keyword within a natural month, such as March 2024.

module_table_impressions_click_tips.message: The total number of times that search results are clicked for a specific keyword within a natural month, such as March 2024.

reversing_table_rank_position_tips.message: The exact location of the given product Listing display position for organic results.

reversing_table_ad_rank_position_tips.message: The exact location of the given product Listing display position for sponsored results.

reversing_table_no_rank_tips.message: This ASIN may have once been found on {keyword} on Amazon, but now we don't see it on the first 3 search result pages among organic results.

reversing_table_no_ad_rank_tips.message: This ASIN may have once been found on {keyword} on Amazon, but now we don't see it on the first 3 search result pages among sponsored products.

module_RV_go_website.message: Go to SellerSprite website to see the keyword position

module_RV_tips_title.message: If you are planning to enter more than one ASIN in your search, go to the web app!

module_RV_tips_content.message:
1. Quickly see all of the keywords that competitors’ products rank for and use them in your own PPC campaigns so that your budget is used efficiently.
2. Find the best keywords for your listing to attract new buyers and get sales.
3. Gauge how popular a product is by seeing the estimated monthly search volume of its keywords

module_RV_search_trend_tips.message:
The Purchase Rate Curve is divided between two distinct colors.
The Green Curve represents the actual purchase rate while the Grey Curve represents the estimated purchase rate.

module_MI_chart_ppc_bid_nodata_tips.message: (The PPC bid updates at the end of each month)

module_MI_google_trend_tips_empty_data.message:
Loading Data
Please open later or view at trends.google.com

module_PS_tips.message:
BSR: The ASIN's latest Best Sellers Rank for main category. It may be the ranking of parent ASIN or subcategory when there is no main category rank.
You can click the number to see the BSR historical trends.
Price: The latest BuyBox price.
Review Rate: The monthly review increase/monthly sale*100%.
Newly Ratings: The increase number of ratings over the last 30 days.
Sales Trend: The monthly sales trend for the last 12 months. Hover over to view the monthly estimated sales.
Last 30-day sales: estimated sales over the past 30 days; For example, it’s October 30, 2020, and the last 30-day sales is the estimated sales from October 01 to October 30.
Click the number to see the historical sales trends over the 3 years.
Last 30-day revenue: estimated revenue over the past 30 days; For example, it’s October 30, 2020, and the last 30-day revenue is the estimated revenue from October 01 to October 30.
Gross Margin=Item Price*1 - Referral Fees - FBA Fees
You can click the number to open the profit calculator.
For the detailed information, click here

module_PS_bottom_tips.message: Sorry,  no more data to display !

module_PS_thead_bsr_tips.message: The latest Best Sellers Rank of the child ASIN.

module_PS_thead_price_tips.message: The latest price of the listing

module_PS_thead_rating_tips.message: The latest rating of the listing

module_PS_thead_review_tips.message: The total number of ratings of the listing

module_PS_thead_review_rate_tips.message: Rating Velocity = (Ratings Increase / Units Sold) for the past 30 days

module_PS_thead_review_delta_tips.message: Number of ratings increased over the past 30 days

module_PS_thead_questions_tips.message: The number of Q&A of the listing

module_PS_thead_sales_volume_tips.message: The total units sold of the parent ASIN over the past 30 days (both FBA and FBM fulfillment methods).

module_PS_thead_sales_child_volume_tips.message: The sales for variations in the past 30 days are sourced directly from the Amazon search page.

module_PS_thead_sales_amount_tips.message: The total revenue of the parent ASIN over the past 30 days (both FBA and FBM fulfillment methods).

module_PS_thead_profit_rate_tips.message: Gross Margin = (Total Units Sold – Cost of Goods Sold) / Total Revenue

module_PS_thead_fba_cost_tips.message: Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA) fee is a flat fee per unit based on the size and weight of the product.

module_PS_thead_sellers_tips.message: The total number of sellers for a product

module_PS_thead_fulfilled_tips.message:
FBA：Fulfillment by Amazon
FBM：Fulfillment by Merchant
AMZ：Sold and Shipped by Amazon

module_PS_tbody_product_signboard_has_AC.message: Amazon's Choice for {desc}

module_PS_tbody_product_signboard_AC.message: The listing has the Amazon's Choice badge

module_PS_tbody_product_signboard_SP.message: The product ran Sponsored Product ads

module_PS_tbody_product_signboard_SPB.message: This product has Sponsored Brand advertisement(s), a form of PPC ads. Sponsored Brand ads are usually displayed at the top or bottom of an Amazon search results page.

module_PS_tbody_product_signboard_SPV.message: This product has Sponsored Brand Video advertisement(s), a form of PPC ads. Sponsored Brand Video ads are usually displayed in the center of an Amazon search results page.

module_PS_tbody_product_signboard_ER.message: This product has Editorial Recommendation(s) on Amazon’s search results page. Editorial Recommendations are written by third-party content creators, such as publishers and bloggers that are part of Amazon’s Onsite Associates Program.

module_PS_tbody_product_signboard_HR.message: This product is Highly Rated on Amazon’s search results page. Highly Rated products have great overall rating and number of ratings, based on Amazon’s criteria.

module_PS_tbody_product_signboard_4S.message: This product is from Amazon 4-star, a chain of physical Amazon stores that offer a curated selection of products from top categories that are rated 4 stars and above.

module_PS_tbody_product_signboard_BS.message: The listing has the Best Seller badge

module_PS_tbody_product_signboard_NR.message: The listing has the New Release badge

module_PS_tbody_product_signboard_LTD.message: This indicate that the listing is currently on a limited-time deal

module_PS_tbody_product_signboard_ABS.message: The product has A+ brand story content

module_PS_tbody_product_signboard_V.message: The product has a video introduction

module_PS_tbody_category_tips.message: Click to see complete category pathway.

Click to view sales trends
Other blue numbers can be clicked to view trends also

module_PS_tips_row_month_sale_avg.message: Daily Units Sold: {dayUnits}/day.Click to see details.

module_PS_tips_row_rate.message:
View daily sales
Rating Velocity = Number of Ratings / Units Sold.

module_PS_pop_echart_bsrTips.message: click BSR label to view trends

module_PS_pop_echart_bsr_tag_tips.message: Click the BSR icon above to display individually

module_PS_summary_count_tips.message: The number of ASINs displayed on this page.

module_PS_summary_all_sales_volume_tips.message:
Total units sold on the current page. Average Units Sold = total units sold/number of products on the current page
Products that do not have units sold data will not be counted.

module_PS_summary_avg_sales_volume_tips.message:
Avg. Units Sold = total units sold/number of products. Products that do not have units sold data will not be counted.
The bottom left number shows the lowest units sold, and the right shows highest units sold.

module_PS_summary_all_sales_amount_tips.message:
Total revenue of the products on the current page.Average Revenue = total revenue / number of products.
Products that have not generated revenue will not be counted.

module_PS_summary_avg_sales_amount_tips.message:
Average Revenue = total units sold / number of products. Products that have not generated revenue will not be counted.
The bottom left number shows the lowest units sold, and the right shows the highest units sold.

module_PS_summary_avg_BSR_tips.message:
Average BSR = sum of BSRs/number of products. Products that do not have a BSR will not be counted.
The bottom left number shows the highest BSR, and the right shows the lowest BSR.

module_PS_summary_avg_price_tips.message:
Average Price = sum of prices/number of products.
The bottom left number shows the lowest price, and the right shows the highest price.

module_PS_summary_avg_rating_tips.message:
Average Rating= sum of average rating of products/ number of products.
The bottom left number shows the lowest rating, and the right shows the highest rating.

module_PS_summary_avg_review_tips.message:
Avg.Ratings = total ratings of products/ number of products.
The bottom left number shows the lowest number of ratings, and the right shows the highest number of ratings.

module_PS_summary_avg_available_on_tips.message:
Average listing age = Sum of listings age / Number of products. Useful in evaluating the life cycle of products.
The bottom left number shows the age of the youngest listing, and the right shows the oldest listing.

module_PS_parent_changes_finally.message: The variation ({asin}) changed {time} times and was finally merged into its parent product ({pasin}), resulting in abnormal sales

module_PS_parent_changes_from.message: The variation({asin}) split from the parent product({pasin}), resulting in abnormal sales

module_PS_parent_changes_to.message: The variation ({asin}) was merged into the parent product ({pasin}), resulting in abnormal sales

module_PS_empty_cont.message: No results match the filters you've set

module_PS_grade_tips_F.message: Less than 45% of real ratings (Source: Fakespot)

module_PS_open_calculator.message: Open the web FBA profit calculator

module_PS_calculator_revenue_ship_price_.message: Shipping fees charged to the customer.

module_PS_calculator_purchasing_cost_tip.message: Cost of purchasing the product from the supplier or manufacturer.

module_PS_calculator_ship_to_amazon_tips.message:
Transportation costs of the product from the supplier to Amazon's warehouse.
Shipping methods include sea shipping, air shipping, and sea+truck combination. Fees are automatically calculated based on size and weight upon switching between options.
Transportation costs of the product from the supplier to Amazon's warehouse.

module_PS_calculator_vat_tips.message:
Value Added Tax (VAT) is a tax levied on consumer spending.
The applicable VAT rate varies across different European countries/regions. The system will automatically populate the rate based on the country, but you can also modify it manually.

module_PS_calculator_other_cost_tips.message: Other costs besides those listed above, such as packaging fees, labor costs, etc.

module_PS_calculator_PPC_cost_tips.message: Advertising expenses incurred for promotions on Amazon, such as Sponsored Products ads and Sponsored Brands ads.

module_PS_calculator_int_promo_cost_tips.message: Expenses for promotional activities conducted within Amazon, such as Coupons and Deals.

module_PS_calculator_ext_marketing_cost_.message: Costs associated with promotional activities conducted outside Amazon.

module_PS_calculator_goods_status_tips.message:
If the product is damaged and cannot be resold, the seller must bear higher after-sales costs.
After-sales cost (undamaged product) = (FBA shipping fees + Amazon Commission fee * 20%) * Return rate
After-sales cost (damaged product) = (Product cost + FBA shipping fees + Amazon Commission fee * 20%) * Return rate

module_PS_calculator_return_rate_tips.message: Return rate = Number of returns ÷ Total sales volume.

module_PS_calculator_category_tips.message: The product category on Amazon, with different sales commissions and policies depending on the category.

module_PS_calculator_referral_fees_tips.message: A percentage charged on every sale, varying by product category and price range.

module_PS_calculator_fba_fees_tips.message: The cost of delivering the product from Amazon's warehouse to the customer, automatically calculated based on product size, weight, and category.

module_PS_calculator_tips_revenue.message:
Revenue includes two parts: Listing Price and Shipping Price.
Listing Price: the current price of the product.
Consumer Shipping Fee: the shipping fee charged to the consumer when they make a purchase, which could be different based on geographic region.

module_PS_calculator_revenue_tips.message: The product's selling price on Amazon.

module_PS_calculator_tips_product_cost.message:
Cost of Goods includes Units Cost and Shipping Cost to Amazon.
Units Costs can be referenced from similar products on alibaba.com.

module_PS_calculator_tips_market_cost.message:
Marketing Cost includes Pay-per-Click Cost, Promotional Costs, and Others.
PPC cost can be set to 50% of Units Price for upfront spending.
Other Costs may include Google Advertising, Facebook Advertising, and other Marketing Costs.

module_PS_calculator_tips_after_sales.message:
After-sales cost mainly includes refund rate (preferably less than 10%).
After-Sales Cost (with damaged product) = (FBA Fulfillment Fees + Referral Fees * 20%) * Return Rate
>After-Sales Cost (without damaged product) = (Product Cost + FBA Fulfillment Fees + Referral Fees * 20%) * Return Rate

module_PS_calculator_tips_amazon_fees.message:
Amazon Fees include Referral Fees and FBA Fees.
Referral Fee: Amazon charges a referral fee for each item sold. The amount depends on the product category. Most referral fees are between 8% and 15%.
FBA Fees: the system calculates and fills-in automatically based on dimensions and weight.
Tip: The above values can also be modified by yourself.

module_PS_calculator_tips_sales.message: Monthly Units Sold of products, which can be estimated based on competitors’ products.

module_PS_calculator_tips_exchange_rate.message:
The current exchange rate is taken daily.
Exchange Rate may be different from that on Google due to update frequency.
BOC Exchange Rate: https://www.boc.cn/sourcedb/whpj/enindex_1619.html

module_PS_report_btn_analysis_tips.message: System is unable to do market analysis due to you are not on the "search results page" and "BSR".

module_PS_report_text_samples_is_less.message: It is recommended to start with a sample of at least 100 products.

module_PS_report_text_load_more.message: Click the “Load More” button located at the bottom of the extension to add more products to the sample.

module_PS_report_btn_add_tips.message: It is recommended to load 100 products before generating the Market Analysis Report.

module_PS_report_btn_analyze_now_tips.message: Generate Market Analysis Report with the current sample size.

module_PS_report_text_view_later.message: Or check it on web version "Market Research - Extension Report".

module_KC_textarea_error_limit.message: Sorry, only {limit_num} keywords are available for visitors

module_KC_thead_page_tips.message:
(Organic Location
Sponsored Location)
The exact location of the given product listing after entering the particular keyword(s). ASIN Location is represented by Result Page, and Position on Page. If the provided keyword(s) do not meet the data index requirements, an (X) will show under the location.
If you only see a Result Page without Position on Page, this indicates that Amazon only displays (X) Result Pages of this keyword. Therefore, there is no connection between this keyword and the given ASIN within the first (X) Result Pages.
The upper values represent the organic location of the listing relative to the given keyword(s), while the lower values represent the sponsored location of the listing relative to the given keyword(s).

module_KC_thead_position_tips.message: The exact location of the given product Listing after entering the particular keyword(s).For example, if one keyword ranks on the 5th page5(48 Listings per page), the exact location=2*48+5=101.

module_KC_tbody_SB_title.message: The product run Sponsored Product Brand ads for the keyword

module_KC_tbody_SBV_title.message: The product run Sponsored Product Video ads for the keyword

module_KC_tbody_HR_title.message: The product run Highly Rated ads for the keyword

error_not_support_title_PS.message: Searching field will be required if you not on the Amazon website.

error_not_support_tips_PS.message:
1. You can enter the ASIN or Keywords for searching.
2. SellerSprite extension supports US/Japan/Germany/UK/France/Spain/Italy marketplaces.

error_empty_items_title_RV.message: Sorry,system could not find any traffic-driven keywords for this ASIN

error_empty_items_tips_RV.message:
The ASIN was newly launched for only 1-2months.
There is no keyword driving organic traffic to this ASIN.
We do not support this marketplace.
You can enter the ASIN or select marketplaces in the top right corner.

error_empty_items_title_PS.message: Sorry, system could not find the sales data for this ASIN

error_empty_items_tips_PS.message:
1、The ASIN was newly launched.
2、The sales of the ASIN is too low.
3、System does not collect such product's sales data.
4、You can enter variations or competitors' ASIN in the top right corner.
5、You may have an extension that conflicts with the Sellersprite. Please disable other extensions and try again.

module_inventory_dialog_tips.message:
The Total Inventory is in the upper right corner, and click the FBA, FBM, AMZ to view the inventory of that seller type.
Note: A single seller may have different stock levels at different prices. Remember to check stock levels in conjunction with price and the seller’s name.
Hover over the camera icon for a stock snapshot. It is useful for checking changes in BuyBox stock levels and daily units sold.
Stock snapshots are only cached after loading.

module_inventory_tips.message:
The stock number shown at the top is the ASIN’s stock level.
Located below are the stock levels of other sellers. The current BuyBox stock level is displayed with the orange background.
Note: A single seller may have different stock levels at different prices. Remember to check stock levels in conjunction with price and the seller’s name.
Stock column will not appear for the following causes:
1. Seller set maximum order quantity
2. The number of goods in stock is more than 999
Hover over the camera icon for a stock snapshot. It is useful for checking changes in BuyBox stock levels and daily units sold.
Stock snapshots are only cached after loading.

excel_export_remark_reviews.message:

quick_view_search_num_tips.message:
The more products appear in the first 3 pages of search results for a given keyword, the less competitive the market segment is.
It means that this market segment is not dominated by certain products, which makes it easier for you to target it.
Eg：Organic 369/48
Organic 369/48 means that in the last 30 days, 369 products have appeared on the first 3 organic result pages among all products. 48 is the number of organic positions they competed for, which tells us how competitive a position is.
369/48*3 (the first 3 pages), the larger the score, the more intense the competition for the organic position of the keyword.

quick_view_tips_fba.message: FBA fees are calculated based on size, weight, and category of products.

quick_view_tips_margin.message:
Gross Margin is calculated by subtracting product commission and FBA fees from product price, and dividing that number by product price.

For example: product price = $100, commission = $20, and FBA fees = $15, then Gross Margin = (100 - ( 20 + 15 ) ) / 100 = 65%.

quick_view_tips_lqs.message:
The score is calculated based on the image, description, and ratings of products.
10 is the highest score. The higher score represents the better-optimized listing.

Hover the mouse over the icon on the right to view the score details.

filter_product_launch_date_tips.message: The Publication Date is the date the child ASIN was first listed on Amazon. If the Publication Date is not open to sellers, then the date when the first review was published for that listing will be used. A product whose Publication Date is within 1 year tends to have more potential and less risk.

filter_product_other_tips.message:
Best Seller: Badge awarded by Amazon to the best-selling product in a particular category or sub-category.
Amazon’s Choice: Badge awarded by Amazon based on keywords. Other metrics include but are not limited to low return rates, high ratings and reviews rate, fulfillment speed (FBA preferred), high conversion rates.
New Release: Badge given to products within the first 90 days from publication date.
Sponsored: Tag indicating the listing has a cost-per-click (CPC) campaign.

keyword_click_rate_tips.message: Click Concentration is calculated by taking the top three ASINs’ number of clicks combined, divided by the total amount of clicks.

goods_source_zhtyf_tips.message:
Overall Score is an indicator used to measure the service level of 1688 suppliers. It helps buyers quickly understand a supplier's service quality and market performance when selecting suppliers.

This score is mainly based on the return experience, product quality, delivery speed, dispute resolution, and purchasing consultation combined.

goods_source_24lsl_tips.message:
24-Hour Pickup Rate is a key logistics indicator used to measure the efficiency of a supplier in successfully picking up packages within 24 hours after an order is placed. This metric reflects the supplier's responsiveness and logistics handling capability, making it an important factor for buyers when assessing the reliability of a supplier.

Specifically, the '24-Hour Pickup Rate' refers to:

The proportion of all shipped orders that are picked up by the logistics company within 24 hours of order confirmation.

The higher this percentage, the faster the supplier's shipping speed and logistics efficiency, potentially leading to greater buyer satisfaction with order processing.

goods_source_48lsl_tips.message:
48-Hour Pickup Rate is an indicator of a supplier's logistics efficiency. It represents the percentage of all orders that are successfully picked up and recorded in the logistics system within 48 hours of order confirmation.

This metric reflects the speed and efficiency of a supplier from order confirmation to handoff to logistics, providing buyers with a useful reference when selecting suppliers.

goods_source_fhsj_tips.message: Shipping Time refers to the time it takes for a supplier to process an order and ship the goods after receiving the order. This time window is a crucial indicator of a seller's order fulfillment efficiency and is essential for buyers to understand when they can expect to receive their items.

goods_source_sxsj_tips.message:
Launch Time refers to the cycle in which a supplier adds new products to their catalog on the 1688 platform:
7-Day Launch: This means that the supplier adds new products to their catalog every 7 days. This cycle indicates a high product update frequency, showing that the supplier regularly introduces new items to keep their product line fresh and competitive.

30-Day Launch: This means that the supplier updates their product catalog with new items once a month. This longer cycle may suggest a lower product update frequency or that the supplier prefers to accumulate several new products over a longer period before releasing them together.
